additionalInformation: The item grants the following bonuses: 180 mana, 0.75 mana regeneration, 15 attack speed and 2.5 main armor to strength heroes. 300 health, 1.5 health regeneration, 180 mana and 0.75 mana regeneration to agility heroes. 300 health, 1.5 health regeneration, 15 attack speed and 2.5 main armor to intelligence heroes.
180 mana, 0.75 mana regeneration, 15 attack speed and 2.5 main armor to strength heroes.
300 health, 1.5 health regeneration, 180 mana and 0.75 mana regeneration to agility heroes.
300 health, 1.5 health regeneration, 15 attack speed and 2.5 main armor to intelligence heroes.
name: Pupil's Gift
description: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.
